fields.variableDescription: The total number of attempts that a student has given to a challenge
The average of the test scores of all the student's attempts for a particular challenge
The percentage of correct answers that a student has answered in an(single) attempt for a particular challenge
The maximum of the test scores of all the student's attempts for a particular challenge
The minimum of the test scores of all the student's attempts for a particular challenge
The date on which the student has attempted a particular challenge for the first time.

fields.variableName: Time Taken to Submit a Challenge
fields.variableDescription: The time taken for a student to attempt and submit a particular challenge
